A Practical Question 

     The idea of stewardship should have a practical bearing upon all the people of God. . . . Practical benevolence 
                                                                           113
will give spiritual life to thousands of nominal professors of the truth who now mourn over their darkness. It will transform them from selfish, covetous worshipers of mammon, to earnest, faithful coworkers with Christ in the salvation of sinners.--3T 387.
